params.account: The address of the user to get the number of open orders for.
The address of the user to get the number of open orders for.

fillOrder(address,uint256).details: Borrowers can only fill orders if they have passed KYC verification.

params.account: Address of the lend order to fill.
params.amount: The maximum amount of underlying assets to fill orders with.

returns.borrowAmount: The total amount of underlying assets borrower posted as collateral.
returns.filledAmount: The total amount of underlying assets filled.

fillOrders(address[],uint256).details: Borrowers can only fill orders if they have passed KYC verification.

params.accounts: An array of order addresses to fill.
params.amount: The maximum amount of underlying assets to fill orders with.

returns.borrowAmount: The total amount of underlying assets borrower posted as collateral.
returns.filledAmount: The total amount of underlying assets filled.

params.account: Address of the borrower to query idle capital.

returns._0: The idle capital of the borrower.

killMatchOrder(uint256).details: If an order is matched by multiple borrowers, borrower matches must be closed fully in a LIFO manner.

params.amount: The amount of underlying assets to remove from your order.

returns.totalRemoved: The total amount of underlying assets removed from the order.

params.amount: The amount of underlying assets to remove from your order.

lendOrder(uint256).details: Underlying assets will be transferred when executing the function.Users have the right at anytime to cancel their lend order and withdraw their assets.

params.amount: Amount of underlying assets to lend.

params.account: The address of the user to get matched orders for.
params.index: The index of the matched order to get.

returns._0: The matched order details in the form of a MatchOrder struct.

params.account: The address of the user to get the number of matched orders for.

params.amount: Amount of idle capital to withdraw.

amountMatched(address).notice: Returns the total amount of underlying assets in matched orders for a users account.

amountOpen(address).notice: Returns the total amount of underlying assets in open orders for a users account.

fillOrder(address,uint256).notice: Allows borrowers to fill lend orders with a specified amount of underlying assets.

fillOrders(address[],uint256).notice: Allows borrowers to fill lend orders with a specified amount of underlying assets.

idleCapital(address).notice: Returns the idle capital of the borrower.

killMatchOrder(uint256).notice: Allows users to cancel their match lend orders and withdraw their underlying assets.

killOpenOrder(uint256).notice: Allows users to cancel their open lend order and withdraw their underlying assets.

lendOrder(uint256).notice: Opens a lend order for a user.

leverage().notice: Returns the current leverage value for the borrower scaled to 1e4.

matchedDepth().notice: Returns the current total depth of matched orders.

matchedOrder(address,uint256).notice: Returns the matched order details for a users account.

matchedOrderCount(address).notice: Returns the number of matched orders for a users account.

openDepth().notice: Returns the current total depth of open orders.

withdrawIdleCapital(uint256).notice: Decreases the idle capital of the borrower.
